name: Just Dig It
description:
Banished Crown Studios is pleased to announce one of their first games! If you remember the games your parents used to play as kids, back in the arcade, then Just Dig It may help bring a new adventure to that midst. Built as a bit of a tribute to Dig Dug, you will find yourself in the boots of a miner for Aktens Acquisition Alliance. Your goal? make sure you mine enough ore to return home, no matter the cost. 

PLEASE NOTE: This is very much a work in progress, updates will come often. currently, to quit, use ALT-F4
